Hwaing technlogy VI DESIGN

Shenzhen Huaying Century Optoelectronics Technology Co., Ltd. is a national high-tech enterprise, specializing in the development, production and sales of plastic optical fiber series products, as well as providing plastic optical fiber supporting services.
